GLOBAL.DEVMAIL_NOTE: write us a mail for errors/suggestions
GLOBAL.BETA_WARNING: This website is under active development and everything is subject to change. We can't guarantee for the safety and privacy of the data you enter (but we try our best).

ACTION_NOTICE.TITLE: Call for collaboration!
ACTION_NOTICE.TEXT: Are you interested in building up a foodsaving project or a foodsharing community? Do you know somebody who is already doing it?

GROUP.LEAVE_TEXT: Are you sure you want to leave this group?
GROUP.TITLE: Title of this group
GROUP.PUBLIC_DESCRIPTION: Text you see before joining the group
GROUP.PASSWORD: Enter a password here if you want to make the group private

STOREEDIT.NAME: Name
STOREEDIT.WEEKS_IN_ADVANCE: How many weeks in advance should recurring pickup dates be shown?

USERDETAIL.PASSWORD_CHANGE: Change your password (you will be logged out)

JOINGROUP.NAME: Name
JOINGROUP.WHICHGROUP: Which group do you want to join?
JOINGROUP.NO_PUBLIC_DESCRIPTION: (This group has no public description... yet)

LOGIN.TITLE: Login
LOGIN.WRONG: The given credentials are wrong. Please check them carefully.

VERIFYMAIL.TITLE: Mail verification
VERIFYMAIL.SUCCESS: Your mail address was successfully verified!
VERIFYMAIL.ERROR: Something went wrong. Perhaps you already verified your address?

CREATEPICKUP.TITLE: Create Pickup
CREATEPICKUP.HINT_MULTIPLE: You can select multiple days here, e.g. by holding the Ctrl key.

ITEM.DELETE_TEXT: Do you really want to delete this pickup date?
ITEM.DELETE_SERIES_TEXT: This pickup date is part of a series. Also delete the series?

PICKUPLIST.NONE_HINT: You can create a new pickup on the store page.

PASSSWORDRESET.TITLE: Password reset
PASSSWORDRESET.INTRO: Enter your mail address and we will send you a new password (if you have an account registered).
PASSSWORDRESET.SUCCESS: The request was successfully sent. Have a look at your mails!
